message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer you the product for $140. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I've got to make a living. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to go down to $130 again?
